data.subject: Bought Me a Cat
data.lyric:

 I fed my cat under yonder tree.
 Cat goes fiddle-i-fee.

data.subject: This Little Piggy
data.lyric:
This little piggy went to market.
 This little piggy stayed home.
 This little piggy had roast beef.

data.subject: Hickety Pickety My Black Hen
data.lyric:

 She lays eggs for gentlemen.
 Sometimes nine and sometimes ten.
 Hick

data.subject: One Elephant Went Out To Play
data.lyric:

 bumping and thumping in the zoo one day.
 He had such enormous fun

data.subject: Underneath the Monkey Tree
data.lyric:

data.subject: 하늘보다 먼
data.lyric:
진정 이 세상에 누가 누구를 
 용서 할 수 있고 탓 할 수 있나 
 그대가 보여준 눈물로 
 그대는 내게 할 일을 다 한 거죠
 어디 이 세상에 무엇 하나가 
 변함없는 채로 영
